item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hey! This is the my first blog post written in markdown on my very minimal static site generated by Hugo framework! The blog has been built and deployed through Github Actions! The way it works is I have a Github repository containing the website generated by Hugo, and when I decide I’m going write a post, I can clone the repository, make a new markdown file in the posts directory and do a git push, where the changes will be picked up by Github Actions.
